column1: * 1891 – Arthur Tolkien and Mabel Suffield marry.
* 1940 - Artist Margrethe II of Denmark is born.
* 2007 – The Children of Húrin is published in the UK and Europe.
* 2007 - The second day of The Children of Húrin Release Party is hosted by Tolkien Gateway.
:There are no known events for this day.Category:Datesfi:16. huhtikuuta
